channel.title: posts on pixyc
channel.description: Recent content in posts on pixyc

item.title: executive dysfunction is a bitch, innit?
item.description: it’s about that time of year again, the point where i say im going to do a whole lot on my website just to inevitably forget about it. happens with so many projects and things i think about doing just not to. i am getting a little better about it though. i’ve been making heavy use of Notion so i write things down instead of letting them be forgotten. i have many draft posts and ideas stacked up here and there that i’m slowly chipping away at.

item.title: fl studio rant
item.description:
this is adapted from a reply i left on a forum, not everything is verifiably entirely true, it’s just a raw dump of my thoughts at the time.

–

the funny thing about FL that truly sets it apart from any other DAW is that it’s three parts that are only very loosely connected together in sometimes unintuitive ways.

item.title: pixyc - winter breakz
item.description:
single - 05:26

breaks / dubstep / ambient

i recommend watching on youtube. im really proud of the visuals on this one despite being hastily whipped up last minute.

item.title: pixyc live @ noiz(000) // pilot
item.description: set i played at a vrchat club with the noizewell crew for my birthday in 2025. a bit disjointed but fun.

item.title: yup, new website again.
item.description:
ngl this ended up sounding way cheesier than i expected. also i’m too lazy to make it anymore cohesive. sorry lmfao

years in the making, so many different websites and many iterations later. i’ve done it again. however clumsy and amateurish i may still be, this time i’m more confident than ever.
